message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm initially offering it for $14,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I think that's a fair price considering the value it would bring to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $9,000 is significantly below my bottom line. I could consider letting it go for $12,500. This is a very competitive price for the value you'll receive.

I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $12,500 is a bit steep. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $11,000. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
